message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a fair start.
Your turn to be reasonable Alice. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  This avoids us going into later rounds where the money shrinks.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers, 57-43 is a good compromise.
Alice, let's be practical. The pot is shrinking.  I'm offering a 52/48 split. Take it before it gets even smaller!
I'm willing to compromise, 55-45 is as low as I'll go. Don't let the money shrink further!
